ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This paper is dedicated to the memory of Florence-Hélène Tran who tragically left us in August 2016. We acknowledge the contribution of the BSL3 platform of SFR BioSciences Gerland Lyon Sud (UMS3444/US8), the DTAMB platform of the FR41 Bio-Environment and Health (University Lyon 1), and IBio platform of Microbial Ecology laboratory (UMR5557).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was partially supported by the Region Rhône-Alpes and by ERA-NET BiodivERsA with the national funders ANR-13-EBID-0007-01, FWF I-1437, and DFG KL 2087/6–1 as part of the 2012–2013 BiodivERsA call for research proposals.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data and analysis are fully available within the paper and its additional files as well as at PRIDE database under project accession: PXD005091. Username: reviewer24708@ebi.ac.uk. Password: F8aBJWI5.
